message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,150,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset for your business. Let me know your thoughts.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of our budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your budget constraints.  While $1,050,000 is lower than I'd hoped for, I'm willing to come down to $1,100,000 to make this deal work. This still leaves room for both of us to be satisfied.  Let me know if this price is acceptable.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,100,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,020,000. This is my final offer, and I'm willing to walk away if we can't meet at this price.
